name: Arturo Fuente - OpusX - Forbidden X - El Beso Prohibido
additionalNotes: Arturo Fuente Forbidden X is the mastered evolution of the Opus X with this secret medium to full-bodied blend. Carlito matures this mystery combination in Forbidden barrels in a secret spot of their factory, in a typical toymaker manner. Certainly, this combination of rare tobacco captures the gods' magical and spiritual essence. This Forbidden blend is the mastered evolution of the Fuente Fuente Opus X blend. They're elaborated in Forbidden barrel at a secret spot in the Fuente's Factory. Some earthy tones and a mild fruit bouquet are revealed in this amazing blend's smokes.
